meanings.sent1: The astir city streets were filled with people rushing to work.
meanings.sent2: The ants were astir, carrying food back to their nest.
meanings.sent3: The astir playground was a hive of activity with children playing tag and swinging on the swings.
meanings.sent4: The astir market was a beehive of vendors shouting their prices and customers haggling for deals.
meanings.sent5: The astir forest was alive with the sounds of birds chirping and leaves rustling in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The astir students eagerly listened to the teacher's instructions.
meanings.sent2: The astir cat stretched lazily in the morning sun.
meanings.sent3: The astir dog wagged its tail happily as its owner prepared breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The astir baby cooed and giggled in its crib, ready to start the day.
meanings.sent5: The astir family gathered around the breakfast table, chatting and laughing together.
